title: The Pirate Princess: Return to the Emerald Isle
description: Are the spirits contacting Meg Murphy?First, there was the loud knock that woke her up in the middle of the night. Then she saw that strange woman wailing on the wall of Race Rock Light. Are these just figments of a young girls imagination or something bigger?Meg is given a very special gift on her eleventh birthday, a gift as beautiful and mysterious as it is old. It has been in her family's possession for as long as they have been sailing the ocean. But stranger things await her as she is suddenly thrust on a journey to Ireland, the land of her Ancestors.Join her on a modern day high seas adventure to the Emerald Isle and discover a world of spirits, pirates, hidden treasure and a legendary sea queen named Grace O'Malley, also known as Granuaile.The key to all she wants to know could be in the family heirloom she received, but can she figure it out before the man called The Digger takes everything away from her?
author: Matthew McCafferty Morris
